text: Zygmunt Tarło (c. 1561 or 1562-1628) was a Polish–Lithuanian noble. He was Chorąży of Przemyśl since 1606 and castellan of Nowy Sącz since 1613. He was married to Barbara Drohojewska since 1601. They had three children together: Zygmunt Aleksander Tarło, Andrzej Tarło and Teofilia Tarło. He was buried in Żarki. Category:1560s births Category:1628 deaths Zygmunt
title: Zygmunt Tarło
